snippet.title: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
ESRB Rating: TEEN for Mild Violence, Mild Suggestive Themes, Partial Nudity, Mild Language, Drug Reference
Play The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark today: https://bit.ly/DD2STEAM

Shake moths off your trench coat, splash some coffee on your sixth sense and tune back into The Darkside Detective! A year has passed since the events of the first game, but the paranormal rests for no one. The Darkside has been (un)dying to hear from you, will you answer the call?

Playable now on PC, Stadia, Switch, Playstation and Xbox!
►Steam: https://bit.ly/DD2STEAM
►Nintendo eShop: https://bit.ly/DD2SWITCH
►Playstation https://bit.ly/DD2PSN
►Xbox: https://bit.ly/DD2XBOX

To learn more about Spooky Doorway, Akupara Games and The Darkside Detective visit:
►Spooky Doorway: http://www.spookydoorway.com/
►Akupara Games: https://linktr.ee/akuparagames
►The Darkside Detective: https://linktr.ee/darksidedetective
